values: Im starting to wonder why love hurts so much when its suppose to hurt so little... I cant make him trust me, i cant tell him that hes wrong and im right because supposible thats all i ever say... Its one thing when i do things that could make him not trust me its another when i havnt done shit and hes just making it seem like everything he says is right... I hate all of my other relationships they were horrible but one thing i do wish i still had was a live.. I wish chris could just trust me and let me have friends with out being an ass about it like my ex's did....  If that makes sence... Im just tierd of trying to fix it when i dont think i ever could in the end...^^^^^^^^^ ** Chris just told me he will never love me until he trust me completly... which will be never...   I dont know ...

I Love Chris  <3

    Things have been well latly.. i heard a new song today on the radio called incomplete by backstreet boys ( didnt know they were still alive ) and i liked it... me and chris are suppose to be going camping but its not nice out and its been raining so im not sure if were ganna and hes working :( ... / i miss him / ... anyways i have been talking to meghan latly and shes doing good so far i think... well someone has been e-mailing me stupid shit and im getting really fucking pissed so if you know who they are tell them to stop or something... im getting fed up with it... lol ok well ill update again later i guesss..... bye for now.. <<33 April.

Sometimes i think that trying is over raded. When you think that everything is going to be fine something stands in the way and makes it seem so fucking impossible. Im trying to find ways to take care of this but for some reason it just keeps getting harder instead of easyer. Ian basically told me today that hes still in love with me and that emily was a way to try to get over me. " but it didnt work " as he said. I dont want to be with him its hard for me to even want to talk to him never mind be nice. Im making a new lJ. Ill post it in a min when i get it ok? check it out if you see this and comment to me>:(

I'm sick of thinking of the past. tryed to find the future when all of  the tears fall it all seems so small. Im thinking about the answers i have found so unusually. Love is suppose to feel good. its suppose to be specail but for some reason all i can do is cry. I feel like you turn your back on me like you give up to quikly. I'm trying like i said i would im making a point to do things the way you would. I dont get it. You say you love me but act like you dont want to be around me so we fight then you tell me im the problem im the bitch im the one who is making everything so hard. Im sorry for everything i did in the past i thought it would stay there but i was wrong it follows me every were and makes me see why im who i am. Im trying so hard to say that i can erase it all and that everything gets better and i dont have to worry about it when i look in the mirror see me there and you some were else. It brakes my heart to sit here and not do anything it makes me feel usless when i cant help you, when i dont know what you have been through when i cant make it all go away. I cant wait to go with you far away from here. Maybe we can leave tomorrow? do you think that will make everything better? Im not use to having someone not trust me only not trusting. This is all different. We have the same past maybe a little different but the feelings i have inside are the ones im hearing the ones that are telling me to go to you be with you and that we can fix everything and anything we are going to go through. I believe in us i know you do to. Im trying baby to fix it all to make it all go away so we can be together with out fighting. It kills me when i lie next to you and ? weather or not you love me the way i love you. Im sorry.

Life is great... i think i have my friend sam back but im not sure yet... ian is an asshole and i fucking hate him and my baby and i are doing really well.... anyways g2g talk to you later... 

<33 april

Ok lets get something straight. I DONT CARE WHO TALKS TO IAN I REALLY COULD FUCKING CARE LESS WHAT I DO FUCKING CARE ABOUT IS HIM TELLING EVERYONE WHAT IS HAPPENING AND WHAT I TELL HIM CUZ IF I WANTED THEM TO KNOW I WOULD TELL THEM MYSELFS. And i wasnt talking about alicia with the cutting thing and no CHRIS ISNT MY FUCKING WORLD. OMG i havnt talked to you all in so fucking long how would you even know who is my life or not? and its not agenst the law for me to see him cuz were not sleeping together and since your all sick of my "bullshit " youll be happy to know im not ganna be here much longer.. OK im done im not explaining myself to you anymore im sick of people acting like they know whats going on adn then when you ask they have no fucking clue.

 But anyways for people who do care. This weekend kinda sucked, i packed my shit and i found so much stuff like notes from sam and shit like that i couldnt help but laugh cuz its been so long. I also had to figure out how to get it from my house to the apartment with out making a mess cuz im not doign a good job at orginizing my stuff. My mom is letting me go?  if that makes sence she said that as long as i get a job i can leave and shell leave me alone.. kinda good i guess. Im ganna get a cell phone so then i can talk to people cuz ive been grounded for fucking ever.. if you want the number tell me and ill give it to you when we go and get it. Ok and so chris told me he loved me and i said " umm what?" and then i was like " why?" lol it was a bad thing to say but the feeling in my stomach was unexplainable. Im happy now cuz i really like someone and no i dont care about what people have to say cuz its not up to you and you cant change feelings. I really didnt know what to say but i finally told him i loved him back and then cryed cuz i didnt know if i was telling him the truth or lying to him... I really dont think that i was lying because if i dont talk to him i get so upset and its like when im with him the feeling just keeps growing. Hes never really felt this way about anyone in a long time and hes older so he probably should have right? well Im in love... its wierd but i like it. I feel bad for ian cuz he wont move on... I have told him to and i have been mean to him so that he would and it just didnt work. I wish i could be like be over it and poff it worked... I dont know anymore .. im just trying to figure everything out and all i have really done is gotten myself to move out and lose alot of friends.

Im so tierd of all of this fucking shit.. im about ready to make this friends only and NONE OF YOU can fucking read it cuz i love people putting words in my mouth cuz thats cool.. I think i should try it some time.. i also think im ganna find shit out and make sure everyone knows everything about you like all the time.. Im so fucking sick of this starting at home ending at school... wow i think i know who my REAL friends are and i think i know why for so long i havnt wanted anything to do with any of these so called friends. I have made the tears go away.. remarkable almost now that i know were they come from and why there caused i can say that im ganna make them all stop. How can you think that your better then everyone else in the world when all you do is cry like a fucking baby and cut your wrist cuz your supposive life sucks. Well thats the ever day life of some people here . and then others like more drama then friends and shit like that. Its all fucked up. So i learned that people just pretend to be your friend for a little while then one day there not. Ok so yeah today everyone is talking alot of shit and being really fucking stupid but then when i leave or something the only thing thats ganna happen is there all ganna wonder were i went. oh no i forgot they wont cuz there not real friends. I dont think that me being with someone self is the problem i dont think that me not wanting to be with ian is a problem i think the problem is they all need something to focuse on besides them selfs.

Ok so yeah i have had an umm well lets just say interesting week... lol well anyways ill update later im ganna go now... easy love..

He is the one i wanted to call last night when i had a nightmare. It was so bad that i couldnt breath when i woke up... but whatever i fell back to sleep after a few hours... I do love him... i really think... no i know... Do i?

As time passed I was still looking down at the flowers next to you and thinking about the good-bye that was waiting to come from me. The appoige that i owed you and the things i never told you. Looking up at the sky wondering if she will ever be able to tell you she loves you to. Looking at all of the people who are still to this day wipping away tears. Fighting back all the bad feelings wanting to make everything go away. I was thinking about you Nick and I have something to say. I will forever remember you and you will forever be apart of me. I dont know how to say good-bye because it still makes no sence to me about how someone you could see one day can be gone the next. Now as i sit back and think about it everyday over and over wondering how everyone really close to you must feel. When i think about what they would want to say to you i come up with something so simple and stupid like " sometimes things arent fair no one ever said they would be, but when you lose someone close to you someone you could barrly know it hurts you look back at all the things they have done for you and for them selfs. Nick i cant help but to think that your ok with everything that has just happen i onistly think your up there smiling and laughing with us everyday. I think you made it so that everytime we try to cry we cant. You make it so that when we want to cry we laught when we try to be mad were happy when we want you to come back you make us want you there. Thinking about what my mother had said to me and im sure your said it to you to.. " hes happy now hes not in pain"? I hated to hear people say that i mean how do they know? what makes them think that everything is ok with you when i cant even look at you now. Im sorry? well should i be sorry should i feel bad or do you want me to be happy do you want me to smile instead of crying? do you want me to pray for you instead of yelling at god cuz of you. The anger that was there has growen and the pain of the voice inside no one heard for so long. Now that im crying out telling people i need help they look at me as if im not a person and im a stranger who just walked up to them and was like " hi my name is aprel and im an  addict not only that but i dont want to be on this fucking planet because everyone i care about is gone. " its almost liek i can say it all i want and i can think it all i want but theres nothing i can do about it. I want to be able to see your beautiful blue eyes and tell you myself that things happen words are said feelings are tost and emotions are lost. Time and time again i just want to make it all end but for some reason i cant and i think knowing your there and im here is the reason i want it to end so bad. I think you looking down on us know something is going to happen and you stop you [ you make me san ] thinking about it again {{ I just want it all to end }}

Sorry for you thinking that everything will be ok. making it seem as if i can make it all change. I wanted you to show me i wanted the time but now that im sitting here all i can do is cry. I love you when i dont know you i hated you when i did. I wanted you to hold me and tell me everything would be ok. I want you to show me that i can get over him and i want you to make me see. Im sick of the bad feelings im tierd of always yelling. You told me that you loved me but for some reason you couldnt be with me. You told me you knew and that you could always see that for some reason you wanted to let me be. You said you knew i loved him and you seemed to make it so sure you think i cant get over him and then you close the door, you tell me every time i talk to you that something just isnt right. You hold me in your arms and sing me a lala bye. You love him april you forever will so i cant come into your life right now untill you can get out of his. I want you so much that much is true. I want you to be here so I can show you who I am. Theres a difference between me and him theres so much that he couldnt see you are so different and so loved by more then me. You seem to misunderstand you think that you could move on. You act like he doesnt love you and he never will. When deep down inside you know he will always be there, you know that everytime you turn away from him and everytime he walks away. That funnie feeling in your stomack gets so much stronger, he lied to you he broke his promice he made it so that all of his words are nothing but lies. Sorry I cant help you sorry i cant make this better im sorry im so much in love with you because I can never be with you. The day that i can hold you when your sleeping the day you can be all mine is the day you admit that he is all yours. For some reason you rob have thought all of that and told me over and over again. You make me feel wrong and make me cry so much. You make it seem as if i want to be hurt. Im sorry rob that i love him im sorry this is so hard. But im not going to try anymore I cant make him mine. All i can do now is look at the past. Now im making a future and he will never hold me. im not going to wast my time trying to make you love me. Im not going to look into your eyes. I love him that much is true but i cant keep being hurt by him.

 pS. All the love I hold for him seems to disappere with the hate. All the time that i have wasted trying to get with him when in the end it was a wast. Im sorry for trying so hard, no one should have to this isnt the way its suppose to work. You should love me because im me and you should want to be with me because im me. Not lie and cheat. Just hold and love.   Im sorry Rob this is killing you im sorry i cant stop the feeling im sorry for making you so mad. Please just come back. Dont leave me because of him.

<3 aprel

Hey everyone,
   
   Some times things arent the way that are seen. Someone who you may love right now you may hate tomorrow. The people that seem so close to you and seem like they love you may not. I think that this is all recondeming. I dont think its right that people judge you but if you think about it thats all they can do is judge. Cuz when you let your gard down you may be letting your self be hurt in more then one way. You could be loving someone who doesnt love you you could trust someone who later is ganna rob you. You could be me and question everything just because no one told you or tought you what they were suppose to, you could find your self looking down the path that you have for so long wanted to get away from. When your a child you say that when you grow up you wont do drugs and that you will always do good in school and respect people... well remember that because everything that you said then is all the things you cant do now. When its to late youll be looking back going oh ok so i get it now. Well how does now help you? what does that make better? How can you say you will " change " What does that exactly mean? what does that do to everyone in the end. Everytime someone says they can do it they lied they dont know what "changing " is. I use to think that as longs as i had family and friends everything would be fine. I was wrong. Drugs, friends, sex, etc. all come in and take over all of the things that you use to want and need are the things that seem so far away from you.

   take it day by day

I have made my mind up. Im ganna be who I want to and Im ganna make the choices I want. So Im ganna tell Ian I love him and that I want him back, no matter how much that may hurt Gavin. I looked at it from someone elses point of view and I now get that I need to take my live and start living it. Drug free No more. Everything that I have lost because of them . I mean Ian left me and I hurt him so much I killed my mom. She was so happy with me she thought i was finally ganna be right and have the chance to change it. The drugs have taken a toil of my life. It has made it so that I only cared about that and my drug buddies. I have been thinking in the last few days about how much I have lost and gain. I have gain alot this past year, but then lost it all in one min because I wanted to trip? how is that worth it? I love someone with all of my heart and that person left me when I  was in the hospital because he was so mad that I did the pills. People keep asking me why I did it and how come I couldnt tell people i needed help when the truth is i dont know why i felt so unloved and like no one cared for me anymore. I dont know why that trip seemed so good to me. Well mabe it was the not being able to feel anything for a while. When those pills kicked in my body went numb and sitting here talking about it makes me see why there not worth it and why it was so easy for me to go back to them with a smile for so long. When in the end just like any other time I felt worse then in the beging. So many times i have replaced pain with drugs. and every time it was worse cuz i had to deal with everything all at the same time and it would all hit me at once. All i have to say is that in 5 min im ganna go tell the love of my live I want him back and that I love him and then from there I will live it like i was meant to. Straight. No drugs. And then Im ganna make all of this time that I have to think about what life means to me.
